results.name: Continued fraction expansion of Hlawka's Schneckenkonstante K = -2.157782...
reference: P. J. Davis, Spirals from Theodorus to Chaos, A K Peters, Wellesley, MA, 1993.
link: David Brink, The spiral of Theodorus and sums of zeta-values at the half-integers, The American Mathematical Monthly, Vol. 119, No. 9 (November 2012), pp. 779-786.
Edmund Hlawka, Gleichverteilung und Quadratwurzelschnecke, Monatsh. Math., 89 (1980) 19-44. [For a summary in English see the Davis reference, pp. 157-167.]
